p: TNF signaling pathway, which activates NF-ÎºB signaling pathway to induce transcription of cytokine genes and initiate apoptosis [ 34], was also activated in IBV-infected cells. Important players of the TNF signaling pathway, such as TNF, TNFAIP3, and TNFRSF1B, were significantly up regulated ( Figure 3). Consistent with the activation of TNF signaling pathway, increased expression levels over time were observed in cytokine and chemokine genes (CCL2, CCL5, CXCL1, CXCL10, CXCL2, CSF1 etc.), autophagy genes AMBRA1 ( Figure 4i), and apoptosis genes CASP10 ( Figure 3 and Figure 4j, Table S1).
